## Required libraries
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Loading the data
```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

## Data wrangling
```{r}
table1 <- contributions %>%
  group_by(cmte_id) %>%
  summarise(avg_contrib = mean(transaction_amt))
```

```{r}
table2 <- committees %>%
  select(cmte_id, cmte_name, tres_name, cmte_state, cmte_party_affiliation, connected_org_name)
```

```{r}
ourtable <- table2 %>%
  full_join(table1, by = "cmte_id")
glimpse(ourtable)
```

```{r}
newTable <- na.omit(ourtable)
glimpse(newTable)
```

```{r}
ggplot(newTable, aes(x = cmte_id, y = avg_contrib)) + geom_point()
```
